name: Tortoise
description: '''Tortoise''' is an American [[post-rock]] band formed in [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], in 1990. The band incorporates [[krautrock]], [[Dub music|dub]], [[minimal music]], [[electronica]] and [[jazz]] into their music, and their eclectic style has left a great influence on the [[post-rock]] genre. Tortoise have been consistently credited, as part of the [[Post-rock#1990s: first wave|Chicago school]] of post-rock, for its rise in the 1990s.
